text: A Mule for the Marquesa (1964) is a novel by Frank O'Rourke. The film The Professionals (1966) is based on it. After the release of the film, new editions of the novel were issued under the title The Professionals. Category:1964 American novels Category:Western (genre) novels Category:American novels adapted into films Category:Novels set in Mexico Category:Novels set in Texas Category:William Morrow and Company books
title: A Mule for the Marquesa
